sentence.Network_en: The taste is bitter and disagreeably pungent.
A person regarded as being disagreeably egotistical and self - assured.
sentence.Network_cn: 自作聪明的人一个被认为是讨厌的自高自大和自持的人.

sentence.Network_en: This is one of many costly facts about monetary union now bursting disagreeably to the surface.
sentence.Network_cn: 这只是有关货币联盟的诸多代价高昂的事实之一,如今它正以一种令人不快的方式浮出水面.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... disagreeables 不愉快的事物 disagreeably 不愉快地 disallow 不接受.
Prefixes+and+suffixes英语前缀和后缀 - 豆丁网 ... dishonest 不诚实 disagreeably 不合意地 disadvantage 不利条件.
高考英语高频词汇精选-第51——75期... ... disagreeably adv. 令人不愉快地；不合意地 disagreement n. 分歧；不一致；意见不合.

list.abs: That may be true.I disagree.　我不同意。I don't agree.
disagree... ... disagree with 和。。。意见一致跟人 disagree on 众议纷纭 disagree with 与…意见不一致（人） 不同意.
香水广告对消费者行为的影响问卷 - 知己知彼网 ... 中肯 Neutual 非常不同意 Strongly Disagree 电视 Television.
...用来描述会员对于调查各个项目的回答。采用5分制,从强烈反对(strongly disagree)到强烈赞同(strongly agree),3分为可疑(equivocal)。

entry.tran: 令人不快的;讨厌的;不合意的
entry.def: Something that is disagreeable is rather unpleasant.

example.ex: ...a comfort kit designed to make flying an altogether less disagreeable experience.
example.tran: 让飞行总体上变得不再那么难受的舒适套装

entry.tran: 不友好的;脾气坏的;难相处的
entry.def: Someone who is disagreeable is unfriendly or unhelpful.

example.tran: 他是个肤浅、难相处的人。

sentences.sentence: "`I took no harm from the journey, thank you,' she said disagreeably"

auth_sentence.content: The hand he gave to Jeremy was disagreeably sweaty.
auth_sentence.res_content: The hand he gave to Jeremy was disagreeably sweaty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The hand he gave to Jeremy was disagreeably sweaty.

auth_sentence.content: You never would have known that they had just come off a disagreeably turbulent prop-plane flight from Syracuse.
auth_sentence.res_content: You never would have known that they had just come off a disagreeably turbulent prop-plane flight from Syracuse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You never would have known that they had just come off a disagreeably turbulent prop-plane flight from Syracuse.
